name: Bavity
description:
Bavity, A fast paced puzzle game with balls and gravity. Any group of 3 or more balls can be double clicked out of existence. Stop your screen from filling up, Its that simple.

Classic mode, Balls are spawned from a controllable hopper at regular intervals, Stop them reaching the top of the screen and blocking your hopper.

Pro Mode is Much more frantic, balls spawn anywhere along the top of the screen, If there isn't anywhere to spawn the game is over.

See your scores against other players and check your position on the leader boards.

Save and continue playing at a later date, Games are saved into the Steam cloud.
